mapper.select:
SELECT idx AS partner_idx , name , area , score FROM PARTNER WHERE approval_status = 'Y' ORDER BY total_reservation DESC, score DESC, name
LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}
SELECT idx AS image_idx , origin_filename , url FROM IMAGE WHERE type = 'P' AND mapping_idx = #{partner_idx} AND thumbnail_yn = 'Y'

SELECT p.idx AS partner_idx , p.name , p.area , p.score , p.type , p.address,
(SELECT (CASE WHEN WEEKDAY(#{start_date}) IN (0, 1, 2, 3, 4) THEN (SELECT MIN(r.basic_price) FROM ROOM r WHERE r.partner_idx = p.idx AND r.basic_price BETWEEN #{min_price} AND #{max_price}) WHEN WEEKDAY(#{start_date}) IN (5, 6) THEN (SELECT MIN(r.weekend_price) FROM ROOM r WHERE r.partner_idx = p.idx AND r.weekend_price BETWEEN #{min_price} AND #{max_price}) END)) AS price
FROM PARTNER p
ORDER BY p.create_date DESC
LIMIT ${limit} OFFSET ${offset}
SELECT idx AS image_idx , origin_filename , url , thumbnail_yn FROM IMAGE WHERE type = 'P' AND mapping_idx = #{partner_idx}
SELECT f.name FROM FACILITIES f JOIN PARTNER_FACILITIES pf ON pf.facilities_idx = f.idx WHERE f.type = 'COMMON' AND pf.partner_idx = #{partner_idx}
SELECT name FROM FACILITIES WHERE idx IN ( SELECT rf.facilities_idx FROM ROOM_FACILITIES rf JOIN ROOM r ON r.idx = rf.room_idx WHERE r.partner_idx = #{partner_idx} )
SELECT p.name , p.phone , p.address , p.area , p.description , p.type , p.score , p.latitude , p.hardness FROM PARTNER p WHERE idx = #{partner_idx}
SELECT idx AS room_idx , room_type , description , standard , maximum , basic_price , weekend_price FROM ROOM WHERE partner_idx = #{partner_idx}
SELECT url FROM IMAGE WHERE mapping_idx = #{room_idx} AND type = 'R'
SELECT f.name FROM FACILITIES f JOIN ROOM_FACILITIES rf ON rf.facilities_idx = f.idx WHERE f.type = 'ROOM' AND rf.room_idx = #{room_idx}
